name: All Bricked Up
description:
Hi!

This is the first game I've officially put on the internet. Made it in just over 10 hours I think. Had a lot of fun with the stress and timer element of the KenneyJam GameJam.

The Game is super simple. Build the tower as high as you can. There are markers at certain heights (the first 1 at 50 bricks).

The game jumps from zen to panic in seconds and I hope you enjoy it.

-Ska
